name: Green Curry of Chicken with Baby Corn (geng gwio warn gai)
recipeIngredient: 2 cups thin coconut milk or stock,
1 tbsp finely chopped kaffir lime zest,
1 tbsp scraped and chopped corriander root,
recipeInstructions: 1. Crack the coconut cream in a pan and add 2 tbsp of the paste.
2. Fry over a medium heat, stirring regularly to prevent the paste burning.
3. Add chicken and continue to cook, still stirring, until the paste is fragrant.
4. Season with fish sauce, and then add coconut milk or stock.
5. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat, add corn, and simmer.
6. When the chicken is cooked (about 3-4 minutes), garnish with lime leaves and thai basil.
